title: Eats iOS app - Select Food Interaction
description:
Pain Points:
----------------
1. While Selecting the menu, we don't even the image, because most of the people already order the same food that they have eaten in the offline shops (Based on my small research)

2. Though adding items is the primary action, in all the app, traditional peoples are following a small plus button to add that to chart.

Design Solution:
-----------------------
Provide user what we need ( Clean screen with hotel only name and time of delivery time)
Even no logos, edit icons in location (Because peoples know what app they are using and they intuitively know how to change the location)
Main Interaction solution is Wherever you click on the list of items that will get added to cart.

Though it's my point of view and solution, feedback is really appreciated

----
100 Best Interaction collection 
----
Mastering-Interaction design through craft productivity and workflow 
----
Sketch of Interaction Process

title: Amper Music - Switch to PRO
description:
Hi Guys,

Here is the second scene from the AI Composer. You can use it as a simple composer with basic settings or switch to PRO and have a whole variety of adjustments. In the next scenes we will show some of the PRO version tools.

Amper is an artificial intelligence composer, performer, and producer that empowers you to instantly create and customize original music for your content.

Request access to the beta version on https://www.ampermusic.com/sign-up

Follow us for and don't miss any updates!

title: Superlative: 04 Glasses.com
description:
Composition, structure, hierarchy are critical aspects to the perception of order and unity within a composition.

By creating my own custom grid systems based on the rule of thirds, I will be making series of shots of web design. Having basic principles of typography, composition, hierarchy and structure in mind.

Full pixels in the description.
See you tomorrow!
